message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for $11,500. I think you'll find this price very fair.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,800. I'm willing to pay a premium for this product, but I'd like to try to get as close to the market value as possible.
I understand your position, Bob.  How about we meet in the middle at $11,100? This offer reflects the true value of this product.

I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $10,900? I'm willing to make a serious commitment to purchase the product, but I need to stay within my budget.
